title: Wall Street Gives Trump the All-Clear to Push Disruptive Agenda
description: In the first weeks of the year, the political landscape has shifted in ways that once might have rattled global markets. A foreign leader was captured. The Department of Justice opened a probe into the Federal Reserve. And a disruptive White House intervened across fresh swaths of US commerce.
